Uses many abilities to support <color=#95C7FF>Rufus</color>, such as <color=#D9DA59>Curaga</color> to <color=#95C7FF>restore his HP</color>.
 
Instead of focusing on Rufus, <color=#95C7FF>defeating Darkstar first</color> is an effective strategy.

Immunities: None
 
Grants all allies <color=#95C7FF><sprite="tmp_icon" index=324>ATK Up</color> and <color=#95C7FF><sprite="tmp_icon" index=326>MATK Up</color> with <color=#D9DA59>Order to Attack</color>.

Immunities: None

Immunities: None

Uses many <color=#95C7FF>lightning-element magic attacks</color>. After a certain amount of time or when HP falls below a certain amount, its <color=#D9DA59>Charge Level</color> increases and it grants itself <color=#95C7FF><sprite="tmp_icon" index=612>Lightning Potency Up</color>.

When <color=#95C7FF>Black Waltz 3</color> takes magic damage during Force Gauge: <color=#D9DA59>Flying</color>, it counters with a <color=#95C7FF>powerful magic attack</color>.

Uses many <color=#95C7FF>magic attacks</color>. Unleashes powerful linked attacks with <color=#95C7FF>Black Waltz 1</color> and <color=#95C7FF>Black Waltz 2</color>. <sprite="tmp_icon" index=325><color=#95C7FF>MDEF Up</color> and <color=#95C7FF><sprite="tmp_icon" index=390>MATK Down</color> are effective against this enemy.
